Rowdy Wolf/Terrorsaur:




The Metal Beast showed no pain as KitKat latched her teeth onto its leg. It 
reared up, swung its leg that KitKat was on, and launched her across the 
section.

Rowdy Wolf fired his rifle at the wolf-bot. He heard the shot ricochet 
inside of its shoulder. It turned its head to Rowdy Wolf, with two beady red 
eyes glaring at him. He froze for a second, then came to again. "Get out of 
here! Go!" He waved his arm in the air. "Slag it, run!" he shouted a the 
others. He fired again, onto the Metal Beast's leg as he stomped towards 
him.

Terrorsaur didn't seem like he was going to stay. He paced in mid-air, 
trying to study the Vok creation. He flew over top of Stingtra's head. He 
flew down and slashed at the wires that connected to Quickstrike's head.

"Blow the cavern!" he shouted. He flew to the side and turned his shoulder 
cannons at the wall of the cavern. He fired multile times.
